channel.title: Story on MillMint
channel.description: Recent content in Story on MillMint

item.title: Atomic Moderne Chapter 1
item.description: img { width: 100%!important; margin: auto!important; } ❖ Note from the Editor: This draft represents the final copy used as a reference for inking – the final lines. It’s not pretty, but it is legible, and once all the inking and lettering and tone work is done it’ll be quite special. There are a couple of pages missing. One between the airport and the cafe, and another to fill out the conversation in the cafe.
